episode_event_specialcos07/4001_1101_010:
Flash back to the moment before Barry and Selene
claimed victory in their spectacular debut as
heroes...
episode_event_specialcos07/4001_1001_030: The so-called utopia for people and Pokémon!
episode_event_specialcos07/4001_1001_060: I’ll destroy this utopia and make it my own!
episode_event_specialcos07/4001_1001_070: Go, my Pokémon! Destroy! Destroy it all!
episode_event_specialcos07/4001_1001_110:
I won’t allow you to disturb the peace on this
island!
episode_event_specialcos07/4001_1001_120:
If you wish to sever the bonds of all the sync pairs
here, you’ll have to face me first!
episode_event_specialcos07/4001_1001_130: Arrgh! You dare stand in my way?!
episode_event_specialcos07/6801_1031_010:
Ahaha! Look at all the
people here just brimming
with energy!
episode_event_specialcos07/6801_1001_010:
I’ll capture all these sync pairs and give them
the privilege of being my darling servants!
episode_event_specialcos07/6801_1001_020:
Mwahaha! With the power we wield, taking over
Pasio will be effortless!
episode_event_specialcos07/4002_1001_020:
Despite that, however...you will get down on your
knees before me when I end you with my dark,
secret arts!
episode_event_specialcos07/4002_1001_030:
My dark, secret arts enter! Take them and
be gone!
episode_event_specialcos07/4002_1001_100:
Watching professional actors perform up close
is amazing!
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_010:
No wonder you’re the marquee star of Pokéstar
Studios, Brycen!
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_020:
Your acting had even more depth than the
last time we worked together!
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_040:
Oh, right! Rosa, you costarred with Brycen before
as the Riolu Girl, didn’t you?
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_050:
Yup! “Brycen-Man” was the first Pokéstar Studios
movie I appeared in.
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_060:
He was so in character, even back then, that you‘d
never guess how cool and collected he actually is!
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_070:
I’ve heard that Brycen-Man is a popular villain
in Unova.
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_100:
Oh, my apologies. I was reflecting on my
earlier performance...
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_110:
I’m wondering if there’s a way to captivate
audiences even more through my acting.
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_130: Even I think your acting is top-notch, Brycen...
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_140:
Is there a reason why you‘re thinking about
this now?
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_160: I met a young man here on Pasio.
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_170:
He was trying to figure out his path forward
in life.
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_180: My intent was to give him some advice, but...
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_190:
I was also deeply inspired by his youthful passion,
and his drive to keep moving forward without
limiting his potential.
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_200:
He made me feel that I should reevaluate my path
forward as an actor.
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_220:
I’m often inspired and energized when I interact
with younger generations.
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_230:
Let’s both put our best effort into our acting so
that we can always shine on screen!
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_250:
I appreciate the three of you coming out today to
join me.
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_260:
I may ask you to act with me again sometime, if
that’s all right with you.
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_280: Yeah! You can call on us any time!
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_290:
I look forward to acting with you again too,
Brycen!
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_310:
Brycen-Man is just one character. No matter how
much I refine my acting, there’s only so much I can
do with him.
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_320: Should I challenge myself and explore other roles?
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_330: No, maybe not...we’re always short on villains...
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_340:
If only there were another villain with the
charisma to stand alongside Brycen-Man. I’m sure
audiences would enjoy that...
episode_event_specialcos07/4003_1001_350: Perhaps I could be of some assistance.
episode_event_specialcos07/4004_1001_030:
I am Bellelba, queen of the Land of Enchantment!
I’ll give you a nice, generous serving of pain!
episode_event_specialcos07/4004_1001_040:
Mwahaha! Let me see if you can defeat my
powered-up Zoroark!
episode_event_specialcos07/4004_1001_050: We won’t give up, even if there are two of you!
episode_event_specialcos07/4004_1001_060: Keldeo and I will stop your evil deeds!
episode_event_specialcos07/4004_1001_070: Hmph! What an annoying goody two-shoes!
episode_event_specialcos07/4004_1001_080: Fine! I’ll just extract your life energy!
episode_event_specialcos07/4005_1001_010:
Wow, Sabrina! Your Bellelba was just as
impressive as Brycen-Man!
episode_event_specialcos07/4005_1001_030: When did you learn how to act like that?!
episode_event_specialcos07/4005_1001_040: Sabrina! Could we talk for a bit?
episode_event_specialcos07/4005_1001_060:
Considering that was your Pasio acting debut,
Sabrina, I must say I’m pleasantly surprised by
how well you can act!
episode_event_specialcos07/4005_1001_070:
But I also noticed that you seemed worried about
something.
episode_event_specialcos07/4005_1001_080:
If something’s troubling you, would you like to talk
about it with us?
episode_event_specialcos07/4005_1001_100:
...As a psychic, I have the power to see the
future.
episode_event_specialcos07/4005_1001_110:
However, what I can’t see is how my own future
will unfold if I devote myself to acting.
episode_event_specialcos07/4005_1001_120:
And while I enjoy acting, I’m honestly quite
worried as whether I should continue it...
episode_event_specialcos07/4005_1001_130:
What if it limits my potential and growth as a
Pokémon Trainer or Gym Leader?
episode_event_specialcos07/4005_1001_140:
Or, if I try to do both, am I even capable of
making it work? I can’t stop thinking about it...
episode_event_specialcos07/4005_1001_170:
So, even a psychic like yourself still worries about
the future—just like us.
episode_event_specialcos07/4005_1001_180:
Or perhaps your worries are much bigger
than ours...
episode_event_specialcos07/4005_1001_190:
Personally, I want you to experience the joys of
acting!
episode_event_specialcos07/4005_1001_200:
You’ve found a path for yourself where you can
truly shine. It would be such a shame if you did
not see where it takes you!
episode_event_specialcos07/4005_1001_240: If you’re not able to see your own future...
episode_event_specialcos07/4005_1001_250:
I know a famous fortune teller from the Kalos
region. Why don’t we ask her to divine your
future?
episode_event_specialcos07/4006_1101_010:
Sabrina and the others arrived at Olympia’s
fortune-telling hall.
episode_event_specialcos07/4006_1001_020:
What lies before you remains unforeseeable.
Such is your concern.
episode_event_specialcos07/4006_1001_030: To see the future of others is my calling.
episode_event_specialcos07/4006_1001_040:
Surely you must know, the future is not shaped by
one’s power alone.
episode_event_specialcos07/4006_1001_050:
And future foretold is not necessarily future for
certain.
episode_event_specialcos07/4006_1001_060:
Yes, that’s true. It’s impossible to truly see the
future in its entirety.
episode_event_specialcos07/4006_1001_070:
Indeed, the future is not fixed—it can change, and
it can be changed too.
episode_event_specialcos07/4006_1001_080:
Its course can diverge based on one’s choices
made and effort exerted.
episode_event_specialcos07/4006_1001_090:
But the future is shaped by something
greater still...
episode_event_specialcos07/4006_1001_120:
People, Pokémon... Your encounters with them are
what shape your future.
episode_event_specialcos07/4006_1001_130:
The stars alone did not lead you here—the bonds
you’ve formed played their part, too.
episode_event_specialcos07/4006_1001_140: Such bonds can be formed in a Pokémon battle.
episode_event_specialcos07/4006_1001_150:
Recall the path you’ve walked thus far, and the
path forward shall be made clear.
episode_event_specialcos07/4006_1001_170:
No matter what happens, Sabrina, you’ll have my
full support in your acting career.
episode_event_specialcos07/4006_1001_190: is what you—the present you—want to do.
episode_event_specialcos07/4006_1001_200:
Your acting was fantastic—and if you pursued it
as a career, I don’t think that would close any
doors to you as a Trainer, either.
episode_event_specialcos07/4006_1001_210: Furthermore, I can clearly see your future...
episode_event_specialcos07/4006_1001_220:
and it’s one in which you become a brilliant,
successful actor!
episode_event_specialcos07/4006_1001_240: Thank you, everyone. I’ve made up my mind.
episode_event_specialcos07/4006_1001_250: As a Pokémon Trainer, as a Gym Leader...
episode_event_specialcos07/4006_1001_260: and even as Bellelba, I’m going to give my all!
episode_event_specialcos07/4007_1001_020:
We wanted to ask Brycen-Man and Bellelba
for a favor...
episode_event_specialcos07/4008_1001_020:
Ohohoho! Just try and take a step closer—if you
dare!
episode_event_specialcos07/4008_1001_030:
With my magic, I can easily turn this child into a
chair...or even a table!
episode_event_specialcos07/4008_1001_090:
You cheaters! So that’s the way you do
things, huh?!
episode_event_specialcos07/4008_1001_100:
Hmph... Bellelba! Stop using such unnecessary
tactics!
episode_event_specialcos07/4008_1001_110:
We can squash them without resorting to such
measures!
episode_event_specialcos07/4008_1001_120:
You’re tarnishing the reputation of my
darkest path!
episode_event_specialcos07/4008_1001_130:
Hmph! Boastful talk for one who constantly loses to
his opponents!
episode_event_specialcos07/4008_1001_140:
You mustn’t allow your pride to interfere with
claiming what you desire!
episode_event_specialcos07/4008_1001_150:
I care not what methods I must use...so long as I
stand victorious in the end.
episode_event_specialcos07/4008_1001_170: In any event...with this, Pasio is now OURS!
episode_event_specialcos07/4008_1001_180:
I’ll make sure to extract every last drop of life
energy from all the sync pairs!
episode_event_specialcos07/4008_1001_190: It’s true, we may have lost... However—!
episode_event_specialcos07/4008_1001_200:
There are other heroes on Pasio who will carry on
our legacy!
episode_event_specialcos07/4008_1001_210:
If you think you’ll get away with this, you’ve got
another thing coming!
episode_event_specialcos07/4008_1001_220: Hah! Spoken like a sore loser!
episode_event_specialcos07/4008_1001_240:
I’ll crush those so-called heroes with my dark,
secret arts!
episode_event_specialcos07/4009_1001_020:
No way! The Masked Royal and Crasher Wake
actually lost?!
episode_event_specialcos07/4009_1001_030:
This is a challenge from those villains...
What’re you gonna do?
episode_event_specialcos07/4009_1001_040: There’s only one thing TO do!
episode_event_specialcos07/4009_1001_050: We’ll take them on—fair and square!
episode_event_specialcos07/4010_1101_010: The day of the battle has come!
episode_event_specialcos07/4010_1001_020: Ohohoho! I’ll deliver unto you pain most exquisite!
episode_event_specialcos07/4010_1001_030: Now, who shall be my lovely hostage today?
episode_event_specialcos07/4010_1001_040:
Bellelba! We don’t need any dirty tricks to defeat
these pipsqueaks!
episode_event_specialcos07/4010_1001_060:
If you’re just gonna stand around flapping your
jaws, we’ll go first!
episode_event_specialcos07/4010_1001_070: Mwahahaha! Fine by me! Come at us!
episode_event_specialcos07/4010_1001_080: My evil Pokémon will bring you to your knees!
episode_event_specialcos07/4010_1001_090:
*sigh*
Very well. Do as you like.
episode_event_specialcos07/4010_1001_100:
In the end, you’ll all become my loyal servants
anyway!
episode_event_specialcos07/4010_1001_110: Not if we stop you! Come on, Scizor!
episode_event_specialcos07/4010_1001_120: My, my. What a lively little child you are.
episode_event_specialcos07/4010_1001_130: I believe I’ll extract YOUR life energy first!
episode_event_specialcos07/4010_1001_140: Hyah! This one’s for my master!
episode_event_specialcos07/4010_1001_150:
Mwahaha! Your talents are wasted being a hero
of justice!
episode_event_specialcos07/4010_1001_160:
Why don’t you quit being a hero and join me as
my underling?
episode_event_specialcos07/4010_1001_190:
The bond I share with Heracross makes me
stronger than ever!
episode_event_specialcos07/4010_1001_200: Scizor and I are gonna crush your evil ambitions!
episode_event_specialcos07/4011_1001_010: Hmph. Show-offs, the both of you.
episode_event_specialcos07/4011_1001_020:
Don’t think you’re the only ones who have a bond
with their partner Pokémon!
episode_event_specialcos07/4011_1001_040: We’re not gonna lose to you!
episode_event_specialcos07/4011_1001_050: With our finishing moves, victory will be ours!
episode_event_specialcos07/4011_1001_070:
The Masked Man will always return, no matter
how many times he’s defeated!
episode_event_specialcos07/4011_1001_080:
Heheh! And no matter how many times you come
back, we’ll always be here to take you on!
episode_event_specialcos07/4011_1001_090: That’s what being a hero’s all about!
episode_event_specialcos07/4011_1001_110:
Heroes are always cool, but I think I might be a
fan of those villains now, too!
episode_event_specialcos07/4011_1001_120: Yeah! Brycen-Man and Bellelba were so cool!
episode_event_specialcos07/4012_1001_010: Man! Those villains were super intimidating!
episode_event_specialcos07/4012_1001_020:
Yeah. Playing a villain might be way harder
than playing a hero!
episode_event_specialcos07/4012_1001_030:
Villains are very important—they present
challenges to heroes to help them grow.
episode_event_specialcos07/4012_1001_040:
When villains are done right, they make the heroes
shine even brighter.
episode_event_specialcos07/4012_1001_060:
Let’s get the heroes and villains working together
to pump up everyone on Pasio!
episode_event_specialcos07/4012_1001_080:
That was a huge production, and you both put on
brilliant performances!
episode_event_specialcos07/4012_1001_090: It’s all thanks to everyone here.
episode_event_specialcos07/4012_1001_100: Really, I should be thanking you, Sabrina.
episode_event_specialcos07/4012_1001_110:
Your decision shined a bright light on Brycen-Man’s
future——not just yours.
episode_event_specialcos07/4012_1001_130:
We appreciate you helping us out—especially on
such short notice!
episode_event_specialcos07/4012_1001_140:
It was a great opportunity to let the rookie
heroes grow!
episode_event_specialcos07/4012_1001_160:
You two are excellent villains, which is exactly
what we need!
episode_event_specialcos07/4012_1001_190: Just now, I think I caught a glimpse...
